creditline: Given in memory of Myron and Belle Maurer
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: Carved human head extending up from base; two cylinders on either side of head; curved top with carved decoration rests on top of head and cylinders
markings: [FX92153], in white paint, on PL side of top; [A-170(?)], partially illegible faint pencil marks, on back, PR edge of base; 4/15/98 FX number removed and repainted on bottom of object at E.M.\'s request, KK.
title: Headrest
